memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Polygon_mesh::Least_squares_plane_fit_region< GeomTraits, PolygonMesh, VertexToPointMap >::Primitive = typename GeomTraits::Plane_3
memberdef.name: Primitive

memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Polygon_mesh::Least_squares_plane_fit_region< GeomTraits, PolygonMesh, VertexToPointMap >::Region_index_map = typename boost::property_map<Face_graph, CGAL::dynamic_face_property_t<std::size_t> >::const_type
memberdef.name: Region_index_map

parameterdescription.para: an instance of PolygonMesh that represents a polygon mesh
a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: the maximum distance from the furthest vertex of a face to a plane
the maximum angle in degrees between the normal of a face and the normal of a plane
the cosine value cos(maximum_angle * PI / 180) to be used instead of the parameter maximum_angle()
the minimum number of faces a region must have
an instance of VertexToPointMap that maps a polygon mesh vertex to Kernel::Point_3

detaileddescription.para: This function creates an empty property map that maps each face to a std::size_t
This function provides the last primitive that has been fitted with the region.

simplesect.para: Primitive parameters that fits the region.

para.computeroutput: successful fitted primitive via successful call of update(region) with a sufficient large region

detaileddescription.para: This function controls if the face query is within the maximum_distance from the corresponding plane and if the angle between its normal and the plane's normal is within the maximum_angle. If both conditions are satisfied, it returns true, otherwise false.

query
Item of the query face
The last parameter is not used in this implementation.

simplesect.para: query is a valid const_iterator of input_range

detaileddescription.para: This function controls if the region contains at least minimum_region_size faces.

parameterdescription.para: Faces of the region represented as Items.

detaileddescription.para: This function fits the least squares plane to all vertices of the faces from the region.

parameterdescription.para: Faces of the region represented as Items.

simplesect.para: Boolean true if the plane fitting succeeded and false otherwise

memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Polygon_mesh::Least_squares_plane_fit_region< GeomTraits, PolygonMesh, VertexToPointMap >::Scalar_product_3 = typename GeomTraits::Compute_scalar_product_3
memberdef.name: Scalar_product_3

briefdescription.para: Region type based on the quality of the least squares plane fit applied to faces of a polygon mesh.

detaileddescription.para: This class fits a plane, using PCA, to chunks of faces in a polygon mesh and controls the quality of this fit. If all quality conditions are satisfied, the chunk is accepted as a valid region, otherwise rejected.

parameterdescription.para: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the vertex type of a polygon mesh and value type is Kernel::Point_3
